# Data: Synthetic ECG Pomodoro Sessions

**Authors:** Chen GuoZhu, Chen KunYu, Liu YungHsin
**Source:** Synthetic (generated by the project frontend demo generator)  
**License:** CC-BY-4.0 (this dataset/documentation)

## Statistics

- Subjects: 0 (synthetic)
- Sampling rate: see `segments[*].sampling_rate_hz` in the JSON
- Each session contains one or more ECG segments (`ecg-seg/v1`)
- Signal unit: `adc` (see `channels[*].unit`)

## Format

### processed/pomodoro_session_demo.json

- File format: JSON (UTF-8)
- Top-level schema: `pomodoro-work/v1`
- `segments[*]` schema: `ecg-seg/v1`
- `samples` shape: `[N, 1]` (single-channel ECG), each element is an integer-like ADC value

## Preprocessing

None (synthetic signal is directly generated as samples).

## Privacy

This dataset contains no personally identifiable information (PII) because it is fully synthetic.

## Usage

### Call ECG service to get a summary

```bash
curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:8001/ecg/pomodoro/end \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  --data-binary @processed/pomodoro_session_demo.json
```
